oshiSkill.name: エンジン全開！レッツゴー！
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] If during this turn one of your holomem has Bloomed, during this turn, 1 of your holomem with #FLOWGLOW gets Arts+30.

spOshiSkill.name: さあ！もう一度！向こう側の景色を見に行かない？
spOshiSkill.description: Send the top card of your cheer deck to your holomem. Then, choose 1 of your holomem with #FLOWGLOW. During this turn, for each cheer attached to the chosen holomem, the chosen holomem gets Arts+20.

name: Rindo Chihaya
extraEffect: You may include any number of this holomem in the deck

skills.name: エンジン全開 演じない自然体
全身全霊 越えてく限界

name: Rindo Chihaya
giftEffect: 300馬力だよ！: If your Oshi holomem is <Rindo Chihaya> and your opponent has a 1st holomem on their stage, on the turn that this holomem bloomed it may bloom once more using a 2nd holomem from your hand.

skills.name: パワフルな運転手だよ
skills.description: If there are 3 or more holomem with #FLOWGLOW on your stage, you may send the top card of your cheer deck to your back holomem.

name: Rindo Chihaya
collabEffect: FLOW GLOWのDJ兼運転手担当: You may return 1~3 holomem with #FLOWGLOW from your archive to the bottom of your deck. If you returned 3 holomem, you may send the top card of your cheer deck to your holomem.

skills.name: 行きます！！！！
skills.description: If any of your holomem have bloomed this turn, during this turn, 1 of your <Rindo Chihaya> gets Arts+20.

skills.name: 鼓動の操縦者
skills.description: If any of your holomem have bloomed this turn, this Arts gets +50.

skills.name: アクセラビートブレイズ
skills.description: If your opponent's center holomem is downed by this Arts, send 1 card from the top of your cheer deck to your back holomem for each 30 damage dealt more than the remaining HP.

name: Kikirara Vivi
extraEffect: You may include any number of this holomem in the deck

name: Kikirara Vivi
collabEffect: FLOW GLOWのメイク担当: Look at the cards in your opponent's hand. If there are any support cards among them, draw 1 card.

name: Kikirara Vivi
collabEffect: 美の求道者: Look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand. Add 1 card from among them to hand. Then, return the remaining cards to your deck and shuffle it.

skills.name: ヴィジランスヴィーナス
skills.description: For each card in your opponent's hand, this Arts gets +10.

name: Isaki Riona
collabEffect: 私の元においで～っ: You may archive 1 card from your hand:Reveal 1 [holomem with a Collab Effect and #FLOWGLOW] from your deck, and add it to hand. Then, shuffle the deck.

skills.name: RIONA IN DA HOUSE~!
skills.description: If there is a 2nd or greater holomem with #FLOWGLOW on your stage, this Arts gets +30.

name: WHAT'S UP!!!!! KEEEEEP GROWING!!!!!
ability: This card can only be used if all holomem on your stage have #FLOWGLOW. Choose 3 cheers from your archive, and send them to your center holomem and collab holomem divided as you choose. However, you may only send up to 2 cheers to each holomem.

name: FLOW GLOW
ability: This card can only be used if you have 6 or less cards in hand excluding this card. Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Reveal any number of holomem with #FLOWGLOW from among them, and add the revealed holomem to hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of the deck in any order.

name: Fugutaro
ability: The holomem with #FLOWGLOW this tool is attached to gets Arts+10. ◆Additional ability if attached to a holomem with #FLOWGLOW Usable at the start of your end phase, if the holomem this tool is attached to has used Arts this turn: Reveal 1 [Debut holomem or Spot holomem] with #FLOWGLOW from your deck, and place it on stage. Then, shuffle the deck. Then, return this tool to the bottom of the deck. Only 1 tool can be attached to each of your holomem.

name: Isaki Riona
collabEffect:
Come to me!
You may archive 1 card from your hand:Reveal 1 [holomem with a Collab Effect and #FLOWGLOW] from your deck, and add it to hand. Then, shuffle the deck.

skills.name: RIONA IN DA HOUSE~!
skills.description: If there is a 2nd or greater holomem with #FLOWGLOW on your stage, this Arts gets +30.

ability: This card can only be used if all holomem on your stage have #FLOWGLOW. Choose 3 cheers from your archive, and send them to your center holomem and collab holomem divided as you choose. However, you may only send up to 2 cheers to each holomem.

ability: This card can only be used if you have 6 or less cards in hand excluding this card. Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Reveal any number of holomem with #FLOWGLOW from among them, and add the revealed holomem to hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of the deck in any order.

ability: The holomem with #FLOWGLOW this tool is attached to gets Arts+10. ◆Additional ability if attached to a holomem with #FLOWGLOW Usable at the start of your end phase, if the holomem this tool is attached to has used Arts this turn: Reveal 1 [Debut holomem or Spot holomem] with #FLOWGLOW from your deck, and place it on stage.
